website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price for a 4K TV with smart TV features. 55-inch size is perfect for small to mid-sized rooms.
pros: Includes 4K technology that ensures crisp colors and notable contrast
great for movies, sports, and gaming
TV is easy to set up and is priced on the lower end of the Samsung TV family
cons: Although its smart functions allows access to numerous apps, it doesn't support some popular favorites
Sound is OK but not great

customer_reviews.title: great picture for 4K material
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection doesn’t work. Unable to connect to any other audio besides speakers. great picture for 4K material. Does an admirable job for low res stuff as well.amazing! The size alone really caught me by surprise. I didn't think it would be much improvement 43 great picture
customer_reviews.author: arye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bargain 4k gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is now my gaming monitor. This will push 3840X2160@60hz or 1920X1080@120hz / 60hz. If you plan on wall mounting this, grab some M8X1.25 bolts that are 45mm long. They need to be precisely this long. TV looks fantastic wall mounted. Edge lit LED panel with super clean image.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Does not have Smart Remote
customer_reviews.text: Would not control soundbar without hdmi connection. No warning on box, in manual or on website. In fact the emanual does not even show the remote that comes with the set. Even my very old un-Smart Samsung can do this. Called Samsung, even talked with supervisor and they were unwilling to make it right in any way. Learned too late to return through Amazon. Very disappointed with Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Candise Flippin

customer_reviews.title: Broke before i received it !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything about the reliability or functions of the TV. It came in a box with a hole in the side. I opened the box and could not see any damage. i proceeded to install all the legs and wired it up. I did notice a small crack on the edge of the left side and thought it would not effect the TV. I was wrong. When i turned the TV on about a 4th of the screen was in a colored pattern and there were lines running across the rest of the screen. So back it goes. I would say it was either banged up before or in the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: G. F. T.

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture isn't as good as my 12 year old Panasonic plasma. I expected more as this is 4k HD. Not sure buying the latest is the greatest. You need to be directly in front of the screen. Not nearly as sharp as the 43 inch that was 6 years old it replaced, both being Samsung products.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture (Game of thrones omg!!!) Sound is shockingly good. Picture and sound is lights years much better than my 5 year old Vizio 1080P HD TV. Xbox one X games look awesome! Also the TV passes the Xbox 4K tests except Dolby Vision!! The TV boots up super fast. The Built in Apps run awesome, Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Go (as good as my Xbox One X) Also I stream my apps using Wifi and it works perfectly, receives a stronger signal then my old Vizio. For under $400.00 my wife and I couldn't be happier! If anything changes I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Y

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of LG’s first 4K tv. The picture was perfect. Perfect color’s, clarity, response time, features, magic remote, etc. totally happy. I buy this one and the picture is just blah and bland. I don’t understand how we have 4K and the TVs still suck unless you spent close to a grand or over. Why are companies even putting 4K resolution out when they haven’t even mastered 1080p resolution?! I knowI know the demand is there so they have to supply. I mean, it’s almost 2020! There should be no bad TVs anymore! Makes me wonder if theses companies make crappy TVs so you buy there $3,000 grand versions?! Idk but what ev haha
customer_reviews.author: Alex might be over there

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung TV is one of my best buys, I truly enjoy the picture Quality! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ferrell Dees

customer_reviews.title: Great TV For Price
customer_reviews.text: TV is easy to set up but the on board manual is awful and adding apps is not an easy thing to do and the manual does not address what you need to do and which buttons on remote you need to use. I am not a novice at these things but it took me a while to get it done. UPDATE: Volume is awful. Sound level increases and decreases during recorded as well as live tv. Contacted Samsung and after about an hour going through several steps, nothing worked. Seam to work for a short time and then starts the increase/decrease at will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat Samsung quality this is a great TV and I love it
customer_reviews.author: J. Deaguero

customer_reviews.title: The picture is so clear, it's almost like 3D.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the picture on this TV. It almost looks like the people on the screen are standing right in front of you. It was also pretty easy to set it up with on-screen directions. There are several Samsung 43" TVs on the market, but I'm very happy I chose this one. The only negative I can comment on is the sound quality. I have to turn the volume to the maximum for what I would call a normal volume.
customer_reviews.author: momlvscoco

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great price point for a very nice Samsung. Comes with all the streaming apps on it, even was able to pick up the country specific ones as soon as I connected it up to the internet. I live overseas and that feature was super handy. The power is also 100-240 v and it's easy to get a new plug to it so you don't have to worry about adapters or converters.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Few audio out options. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Remote is clunky with directional arrows difficult to navigate in a tactile sense. My biggest gripe is audio output options. Basically you're left with optical only. No aux?? Installing a soundbar is an absolute nightmare if optical isn't an option. This is a base model with corners cut.
customer_reviews.author: William Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Great as a 2nd TV if you connected with low wifi bandwidth
customer_reviews.text: This TV works well with 2.4 GHz wifi connectivity, even though it buffers for less than a minute at the beginning of streaming a movie, which is normal if the wifi speed is low. I tried Visio TV in the same TV category, but they don't support 2.4 GHz wifi connectivity, which is what you usually get if you are not close to the modem or router.
customer_reviews.author: Castigliana Cimpian

customer_reviews.title: No 5g, Downgrade from the series 6
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 series 6 TV's and love them. They are no longer available so I got the series 7 for more money and am very disappointed. The one remote system is no longer and there's no Xfinity app like the 6. The remote it has is lame and I'm considering sending it back. It also doesn't support 5g wifi. I wish they would say when the latest model which I was directed to by Amazon has less features than the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good TV but no Access to be able to use Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Personal and Video Gaming and computer access There iate no access for wireless/ cordless or cord Headphones We had to buy a blue tooth headphone due to no input/ out put access Only because it gets really loud in the man cave. An extra $150 for his gaming added on and it was pretty important for competitions or computer access. Next time I purchase a TV I would be looking at that feature a little more closely
customer_reviews.author: ReachfortheStarz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and picture
customer_reviews.text: I specifically needed a 43” TV, which really decreased my choices. I have always been a fan of Samsung televisions. So far this one hasn’t disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cmdirks

customer_reviews.title: Samsung offers a fix for half black screen!!
customer_reviews.text: Settings>Picture>Expert Settings>Auto Motion Plus Settings>Auto Motion Plus>Custom>LED Clear Motion. According to their website, Samsung has a software issue on version 1270.6 for 2018 QLED TV's. It's listed as a fix for TV picture flickering but restored my half black screen. TURN OFF CLEAR MOTION until a software update is available.
customer_reviews.author: Claire G.

customer_reviews.title: 43 inch tv
customer_reviews.text: I have adjusted the color several times but it is still not very bright. The cord for the tv is a foot shorter than our previous 40 inch tv makes it hard to plug it into a power bar with a breaker when mounted on the wall. The sound is not consistent. The price was right. I am having no luck with connecting it to our Toshiba DVD recorder.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wintle

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.text: Set both soundypes types to PCM. Some things better in Standard or Optimized or Amplify. Good sound and enough volume. I preferred to skip the Motion View settings. Netflix HDR content is especially nice on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tired Old Man

customer_reviews.title: I've always had the old style tv.  With all flat screen tvs the people appear short and fat too me.
customer_reviews.text: The sound seems to stay in back of the tv rather than projecting into the room. Don't know if it's the digital feature or reception, but sometimes the picture appears to have shadowed images. It is for use in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Walla Tenn

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Samsung Smart Tv. I have 4 tv's one other smart tv, and the Samsung is the best hands down of the bunch. The picture quality is great and the sound is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: eveslove

customer_reviews.title: Screen damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Just completed a renovation in my home and unboxed this today. These arrived in April and have been sitting in boxes for 5 months as we have anticipated the completion of construction. The screen is smashed and unusable. As I booted this device up the first presentation I was given was a destroyed screen. Would prefer a replacement. I purchased two of these. Have yet to unbox the second. Please help @Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This Samsung TV Only lasted 15 Months
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung TV was great.....for 15 months. Now the right half of the screen is dark. Naturally, the warranty was only for 1 year. I just got through fighting Samsung for a refund for a refrigerator that had a class action lawsuit against Samsung because the ice makers don't work. Samsung apparently has a bad quality control or design problem. I won't be buying any more Samsung appliances or electronics. Samsung just announced yesterday that their revenues for the current quarter are down by 50%. Now, I know why. Don't buy Samsung unless you like heartache and frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Tucker

customer_reviews.title: 6 month review and still great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TVs. I have always used samsung tvs and I'm not sure why the negative reviews. I am using these as monitors for my video editing software and video gaming. The colors are rich and the TVs are very responsive in terms of internet connectivity. This TV will make a great bedroom TV or for video gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Latin Assassin

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and great picture.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Samsung TV and they all work perfectly. This one is no exception. It was very quick to set up right out of the box. Easy to join the WiFi and the smart features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Nice quality, especially for the price. Almost three months into use and some of the screens started to flicker. Talked to customer service and they said unplug for thirty seconds. This fixed the flickering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The TV is great, the in-home installation service was not
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the set and its delivery worked well, and the set works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lighty

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed-Picture good but to leave out the screws for the brackets !?!
customer_reviews.text: They (Samsung) did not include the screws for the brackets in the plastic bag. This caused me to have to make a trip and buy 5 sets of possible sizes in sets of 4. The remote is difficult. Not easy like my other smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniebean

customer_reviews.title: Stopped connecting to wifi after 3 months - Sansung would not take it back and were rude
customer_reviews.text: after less than 3 months, "smart 4K TV" would not connect to wifi. After researching this on the internet, it appears it is a problem Samsung knows about. They would not take the TV back and were rude to me on the phone. I'm stuck with a very expensive tv that doesn't work. They should recall it and stand behind there product. I won't ever buy Samsung products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with such quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: As a Samsung fan I am once again pleased with this purchase. Wonderful picture and sound and is perfect size for bedroom. I had purchased a larger curved screen TV from a different vendor but unfortunately it arrived damaged. I could not get the same one and I found this one at a good price and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Samsung quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you’d expect from Samsung. Great picture quality. Fantastic Apps. Perfect for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: HuntandFishVATop Contributor: Beekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: Like all of my Samsung products, this is a great TV. I purchased this because I was downsizing. Even though it wasn't one of the higher models it still has a great picture. Love the smart TV apps. I actually use it more on this TV than my other. Always works well.
customer_reviews.author: Fry king

customer_reviews.title: Very good TV
customer_reviews.text: It's my first TV in years (I never really watched TV since teenage years) and I love the quality and the size. We have a very narrow living room (almost an aisle) and with this TV being very close to the sofa, it still is a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: A good TV
customer_reviews.text: I like the TV, the picture is okay. The smart features are nice. We are using it in our room with the Netflix, Amazon, and YouTubeTV app, it does the job nicely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Beware - TV turns itself on randomly
customer_reviews.text: This TV turns itself on - usually in the middle of the night. Lots of talk on Samsung forums about this issue but no resolution. I had Samsung out to look at it and they did nothing. They said it has no error codes and advised me to take a picture of the screen next time (as if that is helpful at all). Fed up with the TV and with Samsung support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great TV!  Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Picture is outstanding. We are using this one as a bedroom TV. Highly recommend. Not sure that Samsung can be beaten in this area!
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for a budget tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the price. The built-in speakers not that bad for what they are. The built in wireless chipset is a little dated as well but works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nice image!
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture and sound. We have this in a bedroom. Remote is a bit tough to use but manageable. Needed support today as Smart Hub would not work. Called Amazon Support who transferred call to Samsung Support and got problem solved perfectly. I Ma still well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: drstevedds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing UHD PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Remote should be made of heavier composite material but besides this minor complaint this tv ROCKS! AMAZING UHD picture!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Gantt

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV! The image is sharp; the colors are bright. The setup was almost automatic with on-screen instructions that were simple and clear. The best TV I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: nathan c. wolfson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a great price. I now have three Samsung tvs and could not be more pleased. I can control all with the smartthings app on my phone. Thanks Samsung, I only have the garage and the patio to outfit with tvs.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Power button fell off and backlit screen failed after one year
customer_reviews.text: Under normal use, the power button fell off and the backlit screen failed after the one year warranty. The SquareTrade Warranty advertised on Amazon.com refused to cover the button or the backlit screen. I'm happy the remote still works. Absolutely terrible experience from Amazon and Square Trade.
customer_reviews.author: James Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: This Smart TV worked great for 9 months. Now we turn it on and after 5-10 minutes half the screen goes black. It supposedly had a 1 year warranty but our return and support window has closed. I guess it's best to buy electronics at Best Buy. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: kim miller

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup and lightweight;for an arthritic person that is important . Fits nicely in our entertainment center and the picture is high definition.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This TV was super easy to set up — just followed directions to connect to WiFi and log into apps (YouTube, Netflix, Hulu). Picture quality is great. It’s light enough I can carry it easily.
customer_reviews.author: A D

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 43" 7100 Series 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: By far the best TV i've owned. It is bright, clear and when using HD or UHD is amazing. It was very reasonably priced. The next level TV was 3 times the price. The remote was easy to use. I would like a 3.5mm headphone plug.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for $400
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bang for my buck moments. This picture is gorgeous. The smart functions pair with my iphone perfectly. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B Trunnell

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV great picture very easy to set up very happy with It
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: 43 inch Samsung Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: This Smart TV is in my 5th wheel and is working Great, easy to set up and use, find new local channels as we trevel
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture, low quality. Not like past Samsung TV’s we’ve owned.
customer_reviews.text: I had to put tape around the power cord to keep it from unplugging itself (it was extremely loose) and the picture was very green. Everything had a green tint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV Excellent Company From my Cellphone, Tablet, MP3 Player, Microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade to a smart TV. Everything you want. Great sound and picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - not much
customer_reviews.text: Picture is poor, internet connection frequently drops, can't update the smart hub and not compatible with Disney+ ....failure all around.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and picture
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. The only thing I think would be nice if it would stay on the source (HDMI 1). It always goes back to Samsung home screen and I choose the source. Sounds lazy on my part, but it can just be a small nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Veon

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV for wall mount in bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nice 4k HD SMART TV to wall mount in the bedroom and this is it! 43" was the perfect size I was looking for to fit the wall space available. Smart functions work great. Great picture, and features make this just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Man

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: I love this tv. I use it mainly for streaming. I bought it specifically for that unfortunately many shows on Netflix don’t stream in 4K which is unfortunate but they’ll catch up eventually. I love the smart features especially YouTube tv. Which is excellent
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Connecting a sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone know how to connect a POLK AUDIO SOUND BAR to this Smart TV? My cable as a single needle- type wire. Previous Samsung 40" Non-Smart TV had a single Female Input Plug.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Ricca

customer_reviews.title: As you would expect from a Samsung 7000 series TV
customer_reviews.text: This specific model seems to be a little light on features such as bluetooth but a great TV
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV was really easy to set up and get going. It has a great picture and sound. However the Samsung website is of poor quality and I am still trying to get my TV registered on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Sonize

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and tv
customer_reviews.text: I bout this tv for Netflix and YouTube 😂. Best quality I’ve ever seen, and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Can definitely see difference of 4K with 4K programs.
customer_reviews.author: Hillel Brandes

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: Could do without all the adware. Nice picture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product but showed flaws after 1y
customer_reviews.text: Product is great in generell but after 1y it started to turn off by itself when connected to HDMI - several times during a movie. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for your buck!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and works better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: Loved every part of it.
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded after about 8-10 years and couldn't be happier with every aspect of it.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it has wonderful picture and sound. Was very easy for me to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy THIS TV
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake buying g this TV. The quality of the picture is terrible in comparison to our LG TV. I gave this TV away three weeks after purchasing it only because I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie Litten

customer_reviews.title: Not that smart!
customer_reviews.text: I don't see the big fuss about this TV. I believe the Roku TV had more features than this TV :/
customer_reviews.author: ApexRose

customer_reviews.title: Improved video over 1080p tv.
customer_reviews.text: Speech weak in factory sound setting. The center setting made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: screen became black after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: image, sound, and remote all OK. yet had to have teck come over and change screen after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Hubert danis

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new TV for the bonus room. This was a good price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Baird

customer_reviews.title: What is included in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with the fact that I had to purchase special screws and wall mount kit. The screw holes are not standard as the other TV.
customer_reviews.author: Lanza Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the price. Soundbar is on the way
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a nice TV but you may need a sound bar because it plays kind of low
customer_reviews.author: Trey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture
customer_reviews.text: TV is everything I hoped it would be. Picture is clear and color is perfect. Sound couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: K. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Set up a breeze, great picture right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 100% a Sony guy.......but this model gives Sony a run for the money. Very satisfied with this Samsung. Now to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: James Krzysik

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Good picture. I had a little difficulty hooking it up but I'm not a tech person for sure. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: katlap

customer_reviews.title: Worth
customer_reviews.text: Picture is quality. Sound is what you can expect, if its for a bedroom it works well, if you want it for a living room you should factor in a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Better digital performance
customer_reviews.text: Rapid fulfillment of the order and easy to install. Picture quality and more RAM allowed NetFlix to again be viewed.
customer_reviews.author: rick toren

customer_reviews.title: External speaker system recommended.  ;-)
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size (43") for "our" bed room; not too big, not too small. We do recommend to use your favorite external speaker system IF you want a better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh Yoshino

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback on this tv is that the side view isn't great. The colors don't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV... very easy to install, use/navigate, and great quality. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv
customer_reviews.text: Loved the tv picture and sound are perfect rate this 100
customer_reviews.author: mervin

customer_reviews.title: Good TV, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: The set up was straight-forward and the picture was great, but it has a very narrow viewing angle. Too narrow for our room, so we returned the set. The Samsung panel uses a va panel; ips panels offer a wider viewing angle.
customer_reviews.author: crabman

customer_reviews.title: samsung smart t.v,
customer_reviews.text: bet picture have had in a longtime real sharp color is great i have enjoyed this t.v. and i have had 4 others in 4 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsung 7 Series NU7100 43" - Flat 4K UHD Smart LED TV (2018)
product_meta.description: Step up from Full HD with the clarity of the Nu7100. Get 4x the resolution of Full HD, plus non-4k TV content is upscaled to 4K via a powerful UHD engine. This TV is a clear upgrade for your content. Resolution 3,840 x 2,160. Product Size (W x H x D) Without Stand 38.2 inches x 22.2 inches x 2.3 inches. Power supply (V) AC110-120V 50/60Hz
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 7 Series NU7100 43" - Flat 4K UHD Smart LED TV (2018), One remote TM1240A with batteries, One power cable and One User Manual
TV Size without Stand: 38.2"W x 22.2"H x 2.3"D. TV Size with Stand: 38.2” W x 25.1” H x 8.3” D. TV Weight: 21.2 lb
Screen size: 42.5" Measured Diagonally. Resolution 3,840 x 2,160. Stand Size 1.4" W x 6.6" H x 8.2" D

An elegant slim design for a modern look you will admire. Enjoy millions of shades of color, fine-tuned to create an incredibly vibrant picture, which along the 120 Motion Rate, allows you to enjoy smooth action on fast moving content.

Please note the differences between the UN75NU7100 and the UN75NU710D; NU7100: Dark gray stand color, 450 nits HDR sustained brightness, Mega Dynamic Contrast; NU710D: Charcoal black stand color, 430 nits HDR sustained brightness, Ultra Dynamic Contrast. Both models do not support Bluetooth.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
